product_name: Natrapel Picaridin Insect Repellent Wipes - 12 Count
long_description: Take these handy Natrapel picaridin wipes with you on all of your outdoor adventures! Now available in the U.S., picaridin has been used worldwide and is the best-selling active ingredient in Europe and Australia. 20% picaridin solution repels ticks, chiggers, mosquitoes, no-see-ums, gnats and fleas for up to 8 hours. Each wipe is individually wrapped, allowing you to take it anywhere you might encounter biting insects. Formulation is safe to use around synthetic clothing and will not harm fishing line.
short_description: Take these handy Natrapel picaridin wipes with you on all of your outdoor adventures!
